String.name: Combo Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou attack enemies in front of you with your lance.$BR- The skill can be used up to 3 times in a row.$BR- Each hit makes enemies stagger and regenerates stamina.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Unique Passive]</font>$BR- Braga gains <font color = '#F9B600'>Indomitable</font> when he attacks an enemy, which increases his attack and defense.$BR- <font color = '#F9B600'>Indomitable</font> can be stacked up to 5 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Shield Barrage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your shield forwards and attack opponents ahead of you twice.$BR- The <font color = '#F9B600'>Wallop</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font> skills can be chained.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Combo Drive
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your fist to deliver up to 3 hits to enemies in front of you. Each successful hit grants an effect.$BR- You gain 100 Rage on the 1st or 2nd hit.$BR- The enemy staggers on the 3rd hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Combo Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your axe in front of you and attack the target. The skill can be used up to 4x in a row and gets stronger with each attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Unique Passive]</font>$BR- If you take damage while your HP is below 20%, the damage taken is reduced by 70%, your movement speed increases by 10% and you gain the <font color = '#F9B600'>Power of the Core</font> effect for 8 sec.$BR- <font color = '#F9B600'>Power of the Core</font> resets every 2 minutes.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Combo Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your twin swords out in front of you to attack the target.$BR- This skill can be used 4x in a row and gets stronger with each attack.$BR- You gain 1 Edge with each attack. $BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Unique Passive]</font>$BR- Elleon deals 10% more damage on attacks from behind.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Combo Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your shuriken and charge forwards to attack.$BR- If the skill button is held down or pressed repeatedly, 7 successive attacks are carried out.$BR- The cooldown for <font color = '#F9B600'>Chakra Thrust</font> is reduced by 0.5 sec. per hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Web Arrow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou fire a special arrow wrapped in spider webbing $maxDistance, which deals damage and briefly reduces the target’s movement speed.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Combo Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your greatsword forward to attack enemies.$BR- The skill can be used up to 4 times in a row and gets stronger with each attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Unique Passive]</font>$BR- Hits with any attack skill give you <font color = '#F9B600'>Kaia’s Energy</font> for 30 sec.$BR - <font color = '#F9B600'>Kaia’s Energy</font> can be stacked up to 5 times, and is affected by <font color = '#F9B600'>Energy Wave</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Spiral Barrage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRStrikes one or more targets at melee and mid range, replenishing MP with each hit.$BR- Successive attacks inflict further damage.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Arrow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoots an arrow up to $maxDistance forward, dealing damage to the target.$BR- A successful hit has a low chance of poisoning the target.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Unique Passive]</font>$BR- Ciebel can poison enemies using <font color = '#F9B600'>Arrow</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Wind Walk</font>. The poison effect can be stacked up to 3 times.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Fireball
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou hurl a fireball $maxDistance ahead of you, dealing damage to the target.$BR- Upon a successful hit, the target takes damage and you are restored 100 MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Lightning Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCalls down a line of lightning bolts 15m in front of you, damaging any opponents in the path.$BR- Upon a successful hit, the target takes damage and you are restored 300 MP.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Power Shot
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFires a shell 23m forward.$BR- A successful hit charges a Heart Shell, which is fired on the 7th shot. Generates 100 Willpower.$BR- Heart Shells deal additional damage to and briefly charm an enemy. Generates 300 Willpower.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Ice Orb
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRShoots an Ice Orb that travels $maxDistance forward.$BR- With continuous attacks, the skill damage from the orb can increase up to fourfold.$BR- 4 successful hits on the same target apply Cold Snap.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Combo Drive
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing a punch to hit your opponent.$BR- The skill can be used up to 3 times in a row.$BR- You gain 50 Rage and your opponent takes damage on each hit.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Hammer Swing
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your hammer to attack an enemy.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Unique Passive]</font>$BRYou can inflict <font color = '#F9B600'>Curse of the Dead</font> after a successful hit using any attack skill.$BR- <font color = '#F9B600'>Curse of the Dead</font> decreases the target’s HP by 1% every second, and can be stacked up to 5 times.$BR- At 5 stacks, the target suffers a reduction in HP recovery.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Arcane Barrage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFires a pulse of arcane energy that damages all enemies in a line up to $maxDistance.$BR- Use <font color = '#F9B600'>Arcane Barrage</font> again to detonate the projectile.$BR- The explosion has a high chance to crit and staggers all targets.$BR- Firing <font color = '#F9B600'>Arcane Barrage</font> restores 20 Willpower.$BR- Recover 200 Willpower if the explosion successfully hits.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Portable Bomb
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou throw a portable bomb ahead of you.$BR- The max. range of the portable bomb is 25m. You can throw it farther and faster depending on the charge level.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Spanner Swing
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing the spanner again and again to attack opponents in front of you.$BR- If you hold down the skill button or press it repeatedly, the skill can be used up to 4 times in a row and gets stronger with each attack.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Bloody Axe
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your axe twice in front of you, attacking the target twice.$BR- The first hit causes the target to bleed and generates 150 Rage.$BR- The second hit recovers HP and decreases the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Vein Cutter</font> by 3 sec.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Chain Slash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou perform multiple slashes with your runeglaive.$BR- The final slash resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.$BR$BR<font color = '#00A0FF'>[Passive]</font>$BR- If you’ve been knocked down or are in mid-air, you can use <font color = '#F9B600'>Retaliate</font>.

String.name: Windslash
String.tooltip: Spin around horizontally twice to attack.

String.name: Stand Fast
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Raise your shield to block up to 2,000 damage from the front.$BR - Decreases damage taken by allies behind the shield.

String.name: Stand Fast
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou raise your shield in front of you and block up to 1,000 damage.$BR- Decreases damage taken by allies stood behind you.$BR- A successful Perfect Defense reflects the enemy attack.

String.name: Quick Dash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAfter dodging you prepare faster for your next attack.$BRIf you use the skill again within 8 sec. you can dodge again, but it will trigger a cooldown.$BR- You are immune to stun effects while using this skill.$BR- No collision while using this skill.$BRCan also be used in the air.

String.name: Parry
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Use your axe to block attacks from the front.$BR - You can block up to 1,500 damage.

String.name: Evasion Roll
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou leap forward and dodge enemy attacks.$BR - You can’t be incapacitated while using this skill.$BR- No collision while using this skill.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Shadow Jump
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou leap forward to dodge enemy attacks.$BR- Using the skill again within 3 seconds after the first use triggers the cooldown.$BR- You cannot be incapacitated while using the skill.$BR - No collision while using this skill.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Close Quarters
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Deliver 2 consecutive spin kicks to a nearby target.$BR - The second attack briefly stuns the target.

String.name: Flash Step
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou quickly move 10m in the desired direction.$BR- You can’t be incapacitated while using this skill.$BR- No collision while using this skill.$BRCan also be using in the air.

String.name: Pendulum Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Swing your scythes upward in an arc to damage enemies in front of you as you jump backward.$BR - You can use Pendulum Strike in a chain to interrupt your own skill actions.

String.name: Breakaway Bolt
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Attack enemies within $maxDistance of you and retreat towards your desired direction.$BR - Briefly gain invincibility.

String.name: Arcane Storm
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Attack enemies within 6m of you.$BR - Resist knockdown and stagger effects while casting.$BR - Replenish 15% of Max MP after a successful hit.

String.name: Teleport
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou distort space 12m in front of you and move.$BR- You ignore collision and are invincible while moving.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Roll
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou roll forward to dodge an enemy attack.$BR- Roll can be used to dodge again within 4 seconds after the first roll, but it will trigger a cooldown.$BR- You can’t be incapacitated while using this skill.$BR- No collision while using this skill.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Glacial Retreat
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIcy cold seeps from the ground and deals damage to targets.$BR- Targets hit briefly have their movement speed decreased.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Flying Kick
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Leap forward 7m to strike the target with a roundhouse kick.$BR - Use after any skill to leap 6m further and hit faster and stronger.$BR - Stagger targets after a successful hit.$BR - Gain immunity to stun effects while using this skill.

String.name: Overpower
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Charge forward and swing your hammer.$BR - Targets hit by the hammer are staggered.

String.name: Summon HB
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRSummons an HB construct to help you in battle for 5 minutes. Enemies at the summon location suffer damage and are knocked down.$BR- Once an HB-1 is summoned, you can use the skills <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Stay/Follow</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>Command: Recall</font>.$BR- HB-1 restores 5,400 HP within 4 sec. if you are nearby.$BR- If you move more than 80m away from construct, it will teleport to your vicinity.

String.name: Detonate Portable Bomb
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThe portable bomb explodes up to 6 times in an effect radius of 30m in front of you and deals damage to opponents.$BR- The bombs close to the player explode first.$BR- Opponents hit are hurled into the air.

String.name: Recovery Capsule
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou summon a Recovery Capsule on the ground in front of you.$BR- The Recovery Capsule immediately restores 20% of your max HP.$BR- The capsule remains on the ground for 15 sec.$BR- Allies can also take the Recovery Capsule.

String.name: Evasive Smash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Roll on the ground to dodge attacks and then quickly attack upwards.$BR - Decrease target’s Movement Speed after a successful hit.

String.name: Thrust
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Stab a wide frontal area to attack multiple targets.$BR - Targets hit are staggered. Using Thrust resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>[Leaping Slash]</font> after a successful hit.

String.name: Balder's Tears
String.tooltip: Decrease the damage of 3 incoming attacks by 70% and gain immunity against Stagger and Knockback.$BR$BR - Increase your Movement Speed while the effect lasts.$BR - Gain a Runemark.

String.name: Noble Determination
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRBraga’s noble will reduces damage taken by $VALUE. HP is also restored.$BR- The buff lasts $TIME.

String.name: Shield Counter
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIf you successfully defended with <font color = '#F9B600'>Stand Fast</font>, the enemy takes damage.$BR- Hit opponents are temporarily stunned.$BR- The <font color = '#F9B600'>Wallop</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font> skills can be chained.

String.name: Bull Rush
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Quickly charge forward, pushing back all enemies along the way.

String.name: Commander’s Will
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou cannot be incapacitated for $TIME.

String.name: Backstab
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Rush an enemy and make a lethal thrust to their back.$BR - Target must be within $maxDistance, and becomes briefly stunned upon hit.$BR - Gain 2 stacks after a successful hit.

String.name: Decoy Jutsu
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Place a decoy, then teleport to an aimed target within $maxDistance to strike from behind.$BR - You dodge all attacks for a short period of time after using Decoy Jutsu.

String.name: Sprint
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Sprint forward about 15m.

String.name: Lightning Blast
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Move behind a targeted enemy within $maxDistance and attack all nearby enemies.

String.name: Shadow Step
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou use Shadow Step to dodge enemy attacks. Click again within 4 sec. to jump a second time. The cooldown starts after this.$BR- You can’t be incapacitated while using this skill.$BR- No collision while using this skill.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Pursuit
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou dart forwards briefly in a chosen direction.

String.name: Warp Barrier
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou distort the space around you for $time. You are invincible and 5% of your max. MP is restored.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Mana Barrier
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Concentrate energy and cast a shield that absorbs up to $value damage for $time seconds.$BRThe shield absorbs 14 damage per 1 MP.$BR - The shield immediately disappears after absorbing damage beyond its threshold or when you run out of MP.

String.name: Rocket Jump
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUse the kickback from the exploding rocket to jump even further.$BR- This is how you get past enemies.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Mana Infusion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRestores a total of 1000 MP 5 times over 2 sec.

String.name: Quick Dash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRAfter dodging you prepare faster for your next attack.$BR- The cooldown doesn’t start after the first use, but only if the skill is used again within 8 sec.$BR- You can’t be incapacitated while using this skill.$BR- No collision while using this skill.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Hammer Defense
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Use a giant hammer to block attacks from the front.$BR - You can block up to 1,500 damage.

String.name: Command: Stay/Follow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Give a command to your HB construct when it is within 40m of you.$BR - If your HB is following you, order it to stay put.$BR - If the HB is already on standby, order it to follow you.$BR - Your HB will automatically teleport to you if you’re more than 80m away from it.

String.name: Backpedal
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou leap in the desired direction to move away from the target. If you haven’t set a direction, you leap in the opposite direction of the camera.$BR- You can’t be incapacitated while using this skill.$BR- No collision while using this skill.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Emergency Crystallization
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou are incapacitated for 5 sec., but immune to damage thanks to the crystallization.

String.name: Inescapable Doom
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Gush out murderous energy towards all targets within $maxDistance to temporarily decrease their Movement Speed and prevent them from using evasive or movement skills.

String.name: Leaping Slash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou attack with the runeglaive in a small 2m radius in front of you.$BR- Opponents hit stagger.$BR- Liwon's movement speed increases 20% on a hit.$BR- Can be chained with all skills.

String.name: Dark Herald
String.tooltip: Pull all enemies within 8m of the target bearing a Runemark toward it.$BR$BR - All monsters that are pulled in are stunned for 3 seconds. For players, the number of targets pulled is limited to 3.$BR - If it’s you that’s bearing the Runemark, all enemies are pulled towards you.

String.name: Stunned (Leash)
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Aim precisely at the enemy within $maxDistance and throw a hook to bring the target in front of you.

String.name: Charging Lunge
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou charge a short distance and impale your target.$BR- The <font color = '#F9B600'>Wallop</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Super Leap</font> skills can be chained.

String.name: Roundhouse Kick
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou roundhouse kick enemies in front of you into the air.$BR- You gain 100 Rage on a hit.

String.name: Leaping Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Leap forward and slam your axe down on an enemy.$BR - Deals double the damage to knocked-down targets.

String.name: Blade Waltz
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou spin forwards and attack nearby enemies.$BR- You can use the skill again within the next 7 sec. The cooldown only starts after this.$BR- Using this skill stops the animations for other skills (excludes <font color = '#F9B600'>Blade Frenzy</font>).$BR- You gain 1 Edge on a hit.$BR- The skills <font color = '#F9B600'>Combo Attack</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Backstab</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Combative Strike</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Scythe</font> can be chained.

String.name: Chakra Thrust
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Lunge forward and stab a target at close range. Upon a successful hit, the targets stun for a short period of time.$BR - Reset the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>[Quick Attack]</font>.

String.name: Snare
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou fire an arrow equipped with a snare that travels $maxDistance forward.$BR- Using the skill again causes the arrow to burst and decreases the movement speed of targets in a 6m radius.

String.name: Aurablade
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Strike a target within $maxDistance with the energy of the blade.$BR - Up to 3 consecutive strikes can be launched, with each strike growing stronger.

String.name: Smite
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Jump into the air and strike enemies in the head with your scythes.$BR - Targets hit are restrained.$BR - Using the skill while moving allows your attack to reach farther.

String.name: Rapid Fire
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Quickly fires 7 arrows that travel $maxDistance.$BR - Each arrow deals greater damage than the previous one.$BR - When the final arrow hits, it has a 100% chance of poisoning the target.

String.name: Frostbound
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRRestrains up to $maxCount targets within a range of $maxDistance.$BR- Affected players cannot use evasive and movement skills during this time.$BR- Frostbound’s effects end if you take a certain amount of damage or are knocked down.

String.name: Lightning Trap
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Set a lightning-charged trap that lasts for 10 seconds.$BR - Targets that trigger the trap receive damage and become stunned.

String.name: Heart Bomb
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Lobs a Heart Bomb $maxDistance forward.$BR - If the Heart Bomb hits the ground, it bounces up to 3 times before exploding.$BR - The bomb explodes immediately upon touching anenemy, charming all targets affected by its explosion.$BR - Gain 200 Willpower after a successful hit.

String.name: Hail Storm
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Summons an icy storm 10m in front of you for 6 seconds, damaging all targets in a 8m radius.$BR - Targets have their Movement Speed decreased every time they’re hit. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

String.name: Illusion Punch
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou fire an illusion punch that flies $maxDistance forward.$BR- When it reaches the maximum range or hits a target, the punch explodes and decreases enemies’ movement speed.$BR- Your movement speed increases by $VALUE if it hits.

String.name: Soulbind
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Shoot a soul of the dead forward. The soul returns to you after reaching the maximum range.$BR - The soul travels further and faster based on the charge level.$BR - Targets successfully hit by the soul have their Movement Speed decreased, while getting hit by the returning soul restrains them.

String.name: Remote Trigger
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou fire a Time Bomb 18m in front of you and fall back. Using the skill again fires a <font color = '#F9B600'>Remote Trigger</font> ahead of you and the kickback knocks you backwards.$BR- If you hit any Time Bombs with <font color = '#F9B600'>Remote Trigger</font>, they explode. The range of the explosions is increased by 50% and the damage by 10%.$BR- Hits have a high chance of crit.$BR- A hit from Time Bomb restores 20 Willpower, the explosion restores 40.

String.name: Flame Pillar
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRPlaces a mine that lasts for 15 seconds.$BR- The mines placed are invisible to opponents.$BR- Opponents that step on the mine are stunned temporarily.

String.name: Deploy Drone
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeploys a drone that flies forward and then back.$BR- Restores 5% HP to allies along its path and deals damage to enemies.$BR- If the skill is used while <font color = '#F9B600'>Enhanced Robotics</font> is active, the drone restores triple the HP and hit opponents are stunned.

String.name: Dash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour movement speed increases by $VALUE for $TIME.

String.name: Ground Slam
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Strike down with your runeglaive on the ground in the front.$BR - Targets successfully hit are staggered. Using Ground Slam resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>[Leaping Slash]</font>.

String.name: Spinning Death
String.tooltip: Spin around vertically to quickly attack three times.$BR$BR - The first and second attacks can stagger enemy players.$BR - The 3rd attack knocks down the enemy, and generates a Runemark.

String.name: Shield Barrage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou spin with your shield and unleash two attacks on enemies in front of you. $BR- Stagger targets after a successful hit.$BR- Each hit regenerates stamina.$BR- The second attack reduces the hit target’s defense. If the target is an enemy player, their HP regeneration is also reduced.

String.name: Wallop
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou leap into the air to strike your opponent down with your shield.$BR- Triggers a frontal defense during the attack.$BR- Enemies within 4m of the point of impact are stunned.$BR- The <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Super Leap</font> skills can be chained.

String.name: Jackhammer
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou hammer the enemy with a flurry of rapid jabs.$BR- Reduces defense and generates 200 Rage. Can be stacked up to 3 times.$BR- If you chain <font color = '#F9B600'>Roundhouse Kick</font>, you can keep your opponent in the air.

String.name: Lethal Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Perform a lethal strike while moving forward.$BR- Targets successfully hit by Lethal Strike are knocked down.

String.name: Combative Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou focus your fighting spirit on the point of your sword and strike. Reduces the defense and HP regeneration of opponents hit.$BR- You gain 2 Edge on a hit.

String.name: Quick Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BREffective for rushing opponents over a short distance.$BR- Chaining the <font color = '#F9B600'>Chakra Thrust</font> skill activates an even more powerful skill.

String.name: Slow Trap
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou set a slowing trap that lasts for 20 seconds.$BR- The trap is invisible to enemy heroes.$BR- Targets that trigger the trap are restrained.

String.name: Flash Assault
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Perform 3 consecutive strikes against a target in the front.$BR - Attack a wide area after dashing twice towards the desired direction.$BR - The final blow knocks down the target after a successful hit.

String.name: Death Spiral
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Spin your scythes in a 720-degree arc, dealing damage to all enemies around you.$BR - You can use Pendulum Strike in a chain to interrupt your own skill actions.

String.name: Wind Walk
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRMove in the desired direction and then attack a target within $maxDistance.$BR- Poison the target after a successful hit. The poisoning can be stacked up to 3 times.$BR- If you don’t press an arrow key, the attack is performed on the spot.

String.name: Flaming Barrage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Hurls rays of arcane energy that lock on to a maximum of $maxCount targets within $maxDistance.$BR - Targets receive arcane damage over a set period of time.

String.name: Time Gyre
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Briefly immobilize up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance.$BR - Players, if affected, become unable to use evasive and movement skills.$BR - Time Gyre’s effect is removed if the target receives a set amount of damage or becomes knocked down.

String.name: Firecracker
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRLoad and fire 5 firecrackers at once in a cone up to 18m.$BR - Each firecracker inflicts damage separately, piercing enemies as it travels forward.$BR - Gain 100 Willpower upon successful hit.

String.name: Frost Sphere
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou summon a Frost Sphere that travels $maxDistance.$BR- Use the skill again to make the orb explode midair and inflict damage. Opponents hit suffer Cold Snap for a short time.

String.name: Ground Pounder
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou strike the ground hard, drawing in nearby enemies and hitting them with damage.$BR- The skill can be used up to 3 time in a row.$BR- On a hit, the target in front of you is pulled in and the last strike knocks them into the air.$BR- You can’t be incapacitated while using this skill.

String.name: Captain’s Shout
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRCaptain Dixie lets out a booming roar.$BR- All enemies within 10m have their Defense decreased by $VALUE.$BR- Creates a barrier that lasts for $time seconds.

String.name: Command: Recall
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYour HB construct reverses polarity, pulling you toward it.$BR- You take no damage, suffer no collisions and your movement speed temporarily increases by 30% while the effect lasts.$BR- You must be within 40m of your HB construct.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Time Bomb
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou jump backwards and throw a fire bomb at the point you were standing before. The impact bomb explodes as soon as it hits the ground and deals damage. Opponents hit are hurled into the air.$BR- Can also be used in the air.

String.name: Shield Generator
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDeploys a shield that absorbs up to 8,000 damage for you and your allies.$BR- If you use the skill while <font color = '#F9B600'>Enhanced Robotics</font> is active, you give an ally a shield that absorbs up to 12,000 damage. You resist being knocked down and staggering while the effect lasts. Your skill damage also increases by 30% and the damage you take drops by 10%.

String.name: Vein Cutter
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou dash forward and slash an enemy’s veins to cause bleeding.$BR- You gain <font color = '#F9B600'>Agitation</font> when the skill hits, which increases your attack speed and movement speed by 20%. $BR- You gain 150 Rage on the first hit.

String.name: Ray of Light
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Leap into the air to throw your runeglaive forward.$BR - Targets successfully hit are knocked down. Using Ray of Light resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>[Leaping Slash]</font>.

String.name: Gungnir's Bite
String.tooltip: Dash in a wide circle, attacking any enemies inside its radius.$BR$BR - Pull the targets to you upon hit.$BR - Damage increases with each use.$BR - This skill can be used again within 6 seconds, but cooldown is applied upon the second use or after 7 seconds.$BR - Leave a Runemark on the target.

String.name: Shield Bash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Swing your shield at a narrow area in front of you, stunning the target.

String.name: Spring Attack
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou thrust forward with your lance and attack opponents.$BR- The <font color = '#F9B600'>Wallop</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Super Leap</font> skills can be chained.

String.name: Piledriver
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou punch an opponent ahead of you into the air, leap up, then slam them to the ground.$BR- You gain 200 Rage on a successful hit.$BR- If you chain <font color = '#F9B600'>Roundhouse Kick</font>, you can keep your opponent in the air.

String.name: Cyclone
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Rapidly swing your axe around to attack all nearby enemies 5 times.$BR - Cyclone can be used up to 3 consecutive times.$BR - Targets hit have their Movement Speed decreased.

String.name: Scythe
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou stretch out your swords and spin like a bladed tornado, mowing down everything around you.$BR- Using the skill consumes all of your Edge as soon as you gain 3 Edge or more, and the skill damage increases up to max. 3x depending on the Edge consumed.

String.name: Double Cut
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your shuriken fast and slice the target ahead of you twice.$BR- If you use the <font color = '#F9B600'>Double Cut</font> skill while invisible, the target is silenced for 6 sec.

String.name: Thunderbolt
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Shoot a thunderbolt arrow that travels as far as $maxDistance, damaging enemies within range.$BR - Deal 1.5 times damage against targets restrained by Slow Trap.

String.name: Energy Wave
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Gain Kaia’s Energy upon attacking a target.$BR - Using Energy Wave consumes <font color = '#F9B600'>[Kaia’s Energy]</font> to blast the area in front of you.$BR - Energy Wave’s damage increases up to 6 times based on <font color = '#F9B600'>[Kaia’s Energy]</font> stacks.

String.name: Whipsaw
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Fling your scythes infused with the power of darkness at enemies within range to inflict multiple hits.$BR - The spinning scythes decreases HP Recovery of players by 6% per hit.

String.name: Radiant Arrow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou fire a single mighty arrow $maxDistance ahead.$BR- You can move while the skill is charging and the damage increases based on the charging level.$BR- If you overload the skill, your HP drops by 500 and the damage increases.$BR- Poisoned targets suffer double the skill damage.

String.name: Meteor Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Summons a scorching meteor 10m in front of you. The meteor deals damage to all targets within a 6m radius.$BR - Deal 2 times damage against Frostbound targets.

String.name: Arcane Pulse
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou concentrate energy and launch a huge ball of energy that pierces enemies up to $maxDistance in front of you.$BR- The number of energy balls and the skill damage increase based on the charge level.$BR- If you overload the skill, the damage doesn’t increase and you use additional MP.

String.name: Heart Missile
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Shoot a Heart Missile that travels 35m forward in an arc.$BR - Press and hold the skill key to fully charge the skill and fire even more missiles at the target.$BR - Gain 100 Willpower with each missile hit, up to 500.

String.name: Ice Lances
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRFreezes water molecules in the air into projectiles that travel up to $maxDistance, with or without casting.$BR- Deals double the damage when hitting targets suffering from Cold Snap.

String.name: One-Inch Punch
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Smash the closest target in the front.$BR - The target becomes staggered, and a shockwave occurs in a large area to the back, which has a high chance to knock enemies down.$BR - Targets receive more damage from One-Inch Punch at lower HP.$BR - This skill activates faster when used after another skill.

String.name: Downfall
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou smash the ground in front of you with your hammer.$BR- Targets hit by the hammer are knocked down.$BR- Deals damage based on the charge level.$BR- When charged to maximum, it inflicts a target with 2 stacks of Curse of the Dead.$BR- If you overload the skill, your HP drops by 500 and the damage increases.

String.name: Bombardment
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou fire a bomb into the air, which splits into 11 separate shells to explode the ground below.$BR- The bomb travels up to $maxDistance.$BR- Gain 100 Willpower for each successful shell hit.

String.name: Stun Mine
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Set a mine at your feet, which lasts for 15 seconds.$BR - Targets that step on the mine receive damage and become stunned temporarily.

String.name: Install ST
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou throw a capsule that positions a sentry tower at a spot within $maxDistance for 15 sec.$BR- The heavy tower attacks all opponents within radius.$BR- The tower is significantly more powerful if the skill is used while <font color = '#F9B600'>Enhanced Robotics</font> is active. The attack and HP of the enhanced ST are very high and the attack range is increased.

String.name: Vampiric Blow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRDrain HP upon successful hit.$BR - The amount of HP drained increases based on the charge level.$BR - Gain 150 Rage upon successful hit.

String.name: Chain Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing your runeglaive forward and hurl lunar energy at enemies twice.$BR- The lunar energy travels up to $maxDistance, rapidly piercing through targets along the way.$BR- Opponents hit by the lunar energy suffer reduced movement speed.$BR- Resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>Leaping Slash</font>.

String.name: Dream Slash
String.tooltip: Throw a blazing crescent of dream energy up to 30m, damaging all enemies in its path.$BR$BRDeal Crit Damage to enemies down on the ground.$BR - Leaves a Runemark on the target and decreases its Movement Speed.

String.name: Immortal Wall
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRImmediately restores 40% of your max. HP. The damage you and your opponents take also drops by 40%.$BR- You take 50% of the damage instead of your allies if they are within 20m of you.$BR$BRThe effect is removed if your HP drops below 20% or after 10 seconds.

String.name: Super Leap
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou leap forward and ram your shield into the ground on landing.$BR- Targets near the point of impact suffer heavy damage and are hurled into the air. Reduces your attack speed and movement speed for 8 sec.$BR- Reduces damage taken by 30% for 4 sec. after you use the skill.$BR- If the skills <font color = '#F9B600'>Charging Lunge</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>Wallop</font> and <font color = '#F9B600'>Spring Attack</font> are chained, the target is not pierced.

String.name: Divine Wrath
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Become the incarnation of rage to devastate the surrounding area.$BR - Divine Wrath can only be used when your Rage is full.$BR - Press the skill button to set a desired location, and then press it again to activate the skill.$BR - All targets hit are knocked down.

String.name: Destructive Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou attack all enemies within $maxDistance ahead of you in a wide fan.$BR- Targets hit are knocked down, and targets that were already down receive double the damage.

String.name: Blade Storm
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou confuse your target with an afterimage, then spin rapidly to create a storm of blades.$BR- You dodge all enemy attacks while using this skill.$BR- You gain 1 Edge for each hit.$BR- If you have 3 or more Edge on the final strike, the skill then consumes all of your Edge and deals up to max. 3 times as much skill damage depending on the Edge consumed.$BR- Blade Storm temporarily reduces the damage received by 50%, increases your movement speed by 20% and you receive <font color = '#F9B600'>Tempest Aura</font> for 8.5 sec.

String.name: Shadow Strike
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou hide in the safety of the shadows, removing aggro from nearby monsters.$BR- You stay invisible for $time. The effect is removed if you attack or get hit.$BR- Increases your movement speed by 10% during the effect period.

String.name: Gust Arrow
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Stand still and concentrate all of your powers to pull and release the bowstring.$BR - The arrow pierces through all targets in a $maxDistance line, and creates a delayed aftershock.$BR - You are invincible while channeling the skill after charging.

String.name: Sword of Judgment
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Summon the sword of Goddess of War, Kaia.$BR - Attack enemies within a $maxDistance range and inflict 2% damage for $time.

String.name: Raging Scythes
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou gather focus in your scythe, increasing your skill damage by 50%.$BR- Raging Scythes consumes 150 MP per sec. while active.$BR- The effect is removed if you have insufficient MP.

String.name: Windsong
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRIncreases your movement speed by $VALUE and your attack speed by $VALUE2 for $time. <font color = '#F9B600'>Arrows</font> are more likely to poison the target.$BR- While <font color = '#F9B600'>Windsong</font> is active, using <font color = '#F9B600'>Wind Walk</font> does not consume Stamina.

String.name: Implosion
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Gather wild elemental energy into a massive explosion that severely damages all nearby enemies.$BR - All targets within range are pulled in and you are granted invincibility.$BR - All targets hit by the energy explosion receive massive damage and become airborne.

String.name: Nova I
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Concentrate mana and create an explosion 7m in front of you, dealing massive damage to enemies within a 6m radius.$BR - Decrease damage received by 50% while gathering mana.

String.name: Balder's Vengeance
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThe highly concentrated beams of Willpower can annihilate enemies.$BR- You use Willpower to active the skill.$BR- The range varies up to $maxDistance.$BR- You are invincible during this time.

String.name: Iceberg
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRA glacier flies 18m in front of you. All targets in the area suffer damage and are launched into the air.$BR- Targets along its path are launched upwards.$BR- Deals double the damage to targets suffering from Cold Snap.

String.name: Rampage
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Charge at a target up to 12m away and deliver rampaging blows.$BR - The final hit knocks down the target.$BR - Gain immunity to stun effects while using this skill.

String.name: Execute
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou jump forward and deal damage over a large area within a 7m radius.$BR- Targets with Curse of the Dead suffer up to 6 times the damage depending on the stack amount.

String.name: Burst Fire
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRUses Willpower as a power source to fire projectiles. The damage and crit hit probability can increase by up to 6 times the longer the salvo lasts.$BR- Has a range up to $maxDistance.$BR- Reduces the movement speed of hit opponents.$BR- You can’t be incapacitated while using this skill.

String.name: Time Bomb Throw
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRThrows a bomb that either explodes on contact with enemies or on the ground after a time delay. The max. range is $maxDistance.$BR- The bomb explodes after 3 sec., dealing heavy damage within a 5m radius and knocking opponents down.

String.name: Enhanced Robotics
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Enhance the next <font color = '#F9B600'>[Deploy Drone]</font>, <font color = '#F9B600'>[Shield Generator]</font> or <font color = '#F9B600'>[ST]</font> that you use.

String.name: Unleashed
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Consume the Unleashed Gauge to fill yourself with rage for $time.$BR - This effect increases your Movement Speed, grants you immunity to knock-down and stagger, and lets you defy death even if your HP falls below 1.$BR - Unleashed Skills become available.$BR - Each use of Unleashed Skills grants you Unleashed: Enhancement.

String.name: Radiant Slash
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BR Leap forward and smash down with your runeglaive, knocking down targets after a successful hit.$BR - Using Radiant Slash resets the cooldown of <font color = '#F9B600'>[Leaping Slash]</font>.

String.name: Godsfall
String.tooltip: Leap backwards, and then charge into the ground to cause a powerful explosion.$BR$BR - This skill activates faster when used after Gungnir's Bite.

String.name: Unleashed: Dexter
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou swing with the axe in your right hand to attack opponents.$BR- Restores your HP by 2% on each hit. Also applies 5% of the skill damage buff effect of <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Amplification</font> per stack.$BR- Using the skill after <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Sinister</font> activates it faster.

String.name: Unleashed: Sinister
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou charge forward and swing with the axe in your left hand to attack enemies.$BR- Restores your HP by 2% on each hit. Also applies 5% of the skill damage buff effect of <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Amplification</font> per stack.$BR- Using the skill after <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Dexter</font> activates it faster.

String.name: Unleashed: Beast Fury
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRYou charge forward like a raving beast to unleash a flurry of attacks.$BR- Decreases damage received by 50% while charging.$BR- Using this skill cancels <font color = '#F9B600'>Unleashed: Enhancement</font>.

String.name: Retaliate
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWhen you get up, you attack enemies in the surrounding area.$BRCan only be used after you’ve been knocked down or if you're in the air.$BRUsing this skill grants you the Retaliate effect, making you immune to knockdown, stagger, stun and knockback for 2 sec.

String.name: Retaliate
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWhen you get up, you attack enemies in the surrounding area.$BRCan only be used after you’ve been knocked down or if you're in the air.$BRUsing this skill grants you the Retaliate effect, making you immune to knockdown, stagger, stun and knockback for 2 sec.

String.name: Retaliate
String.tooltip: <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Effect]</font>$BRWhen you get up, you attack enemies in the surrounding area.$BRCan only be used after you’ve been knocked down or if you're in the air.$BRUsing this skill grants you the Retaliate effect, making you immune to knockdown, stagger, stun and knockback for 2 sec.

String.name: Retaliate
